issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a classic/alloy project in studio.
2. Make sure you have all services enabled.
3. Make sure you have the above mentioned modules versions.
4. Build to android device/emulator.

h5.Actual results:
1. The build fails with error log:

fields.summary: Android: Using crittercism/apm 2.1.0 & soasta 2.0 together causes build to fail
fields.environment:
APM module: 2.1.0
Soasta module: 2.0

Studio Ver:     4.9.1.201707200100
SDK Ver:        6.1.2.GA
OS Ver:         10.12.3
Xcode Ver:      Xcode 8.3.3
Appc NPM:       4.2.9
Appc CLI:       6.2.3
Ti CLI Ver:     5.0.14
Alloy Ver:      1.9.13
Node Ver:       6.10.1
Java Ver:       1.8.0_101
Devices:        ⇨ google Pixel --- Android 7.1.1
                ⇨ google Nexus 5 --- Android 6.0.1

comments.body:
I have rebuilt [2.1.0|https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/appcelerator.apm/releases/tag/v2.1.0], it should work fine now.

The issue is with {{archiver}}, I've pushed https://github.com/archiverjs/node-compress-commons/pull/27 to fix the compatibility issues. Currently waiting for it to be merged so we can update our {{archiver}} version.

Verified the fix with 2.1.0 : https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/appcelerator.apm/releases/download/v2.1.0/com.appcelerator.apm-ios_android-2.1.0.zip

Build works fine when both soasta 2.0 & crittercism 2.1.0 are used together.
